verses.text: On that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w audience|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and therein was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w*, that the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* and the \w Moabite|strong="H4125"\w* should not \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*;\f + \fr 13.1 \ft they…: Heb. there was read\f*\f + \fr 13.1 \ft audience: Heb. ears\f*

Because they \w met|strong="H6923"\w* not the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* with \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* and with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, but \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* against them, that he should \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* them: howbeit our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* the \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* into a \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w*.

Now it came to pass, when they had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, that they \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* all the mixed \w multitude|strong="H6154"\w*.

¶ And \w before|strong="H6440"\w* this, \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, having the \w oversight|strong="H5414"\w* of the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add was\add* \w allied|strong="H7138"\w* unto \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w*:\f + \fr 13.4 \ft having…: Heb. being set over\f*

And he had \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w* for him a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w*, where \w aforetime|strong="H6440"\w* they \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* the meat \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*, the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*, and the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, which was \w commanded|strong="H4687"\w* \add to be given\add* to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*; and the \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 13.5 \ft which…: Heb. the commandment of the Levites\f*

But in all this \add time\add* was not I at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: for in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w thirtieth|strong="H7970"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* I unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w after|strong="H7093"\w* certain \w days|strong="H3117"\w* obtained I \w leave|strong="H7592"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*:\f + \fr 13.6 \ft after…: Heb. at the end of days\f*\f + \fr 13.6 \ft obtained…: or, I earnestly requested\f*

And I \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w*, in \w preparing|strong="H6213"\w* him a \w chamber|strong="H5393"\w* in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And it \w grieved|strong="H3415"\w* me \w sore|strong="H3966"\w*: therefore I cast \w forth|strong="H7993"\w* all the \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* of \w Tobiah|strong="H2900"\w* out \w of|strong="H2351"\w* the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w*.

Then I \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w*, and they \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*: and thither brought I \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, with the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* and the \w frankincense|strong="H3828"\w*.

¶ And I \w perceived|strong="H3045"\w* that the \w portions|strong="H4521"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* had not been \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add them:\add* for the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* and the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, were \w fled|strong="H1272"\w* every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

Then \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* I with the \w rulers|strong="H5461"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Why is the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*? And I gathered them \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5975"\w* them in their \w place|strong="H5977"\w*.\f + \fr 13.11 \ft place: Heb. standing\f*

Then \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* and the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* and the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w* unto the \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w*.\f + \fr 13.12 \ft treasuries: or, storehouses\f*

And I made \w treasurers|strong="H0686"\w* over the \w treasuries|strong="H0214"\w*, \w Shelemiah|strong="H8018"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, and of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*: and next to \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \add was\add* \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*: for they were \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w*, and their office \add was\add* to \w distribute|strong="H2505"\w* unto their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft treasuries: or, storehouses\f*\f + \fr 13.13 \ft next…: Heb. at their hand\f*\f + \fr 13.13 \ft their office…: Heb. it was upon them\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, concerning this, and wipe not \w out|strong="H4229"\w* my \w good|strong="H2617"\w* deeds that I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and for the \w offices|strong="H4929"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 13.14 \ft good…: Heb. kindnesses\f*\f + \fr 13.14 \ft offices: or, observations\f*

¶ In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* I in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add some\add* \w treading|strong="H1869"\w* wine \w presses|strong="H1660"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, and bringing \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H6194"\w*, and \w lading|strong="H6006"\w* \w asses|strong="H2543"\w*; as also \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, and \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, and all \add manner of\add* \w burdens|strong="H4853"\w*, which they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and I \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* \add against them\add* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* wherein they \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w victuals|strong="H6718"\w*.

There \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* men of \w Tyre|strong="H6876"\w* also therein, which \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*, and all manner of \w ware|strong="H4377"\w*, and \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Then I \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* with the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, What \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add is\add* this that ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w Did|strong="H6213"\w* not your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* thus, and \w did|strong="H0935"\w* not our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* all this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon us, and upon this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*? yet ye \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2740"\w* upon \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*.

And it came to pass, that when the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* began to be \w dark|strong="H6751"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, I \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* that the \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* should be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*, and \w charged|strong="H0559"\w* that they should not be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* till \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*: and \add some\add* of my \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \w set|strong="H5975"\w* I at the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \add that\add* there should no \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* be brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

So the \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w* and \w sellers|strong="H4376"\w* of all kind of \w ware|strong="H4465"\w* \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w once|strong="H6471"\w* or \w twice|strong="H8147"\w*.

Then I \w testified|strong="H5749"\w* against them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Why \w lodge|strong="H3885"\w* ye \w about|strong="H5048"\w* the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*? if ye do \add so\add* \w again|strong="H8138"\w*, I will \w lay|strong="H7971"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* on you. From that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* forth \w came|strong="H0935"\w* they no \add more\add* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*.\f + \fr 13.21 \ft about: Heb. before\f*

And I \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* that they should \w cleanse|strong="H2891"\w* themselves, and \add that\add* they should \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \add and\add* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add concerning\add* this also, and \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* me according to the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.\f + \fr 13.22 \ft greatness: or, multitude\f*

¶ In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* also \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* I \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* \add that\add* had \w married|strong="H3427"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Ashdod|strong="H0796"\w*, of \w Ammon|strong="H5984"\w*, \add and\add* of \w Moab|strong="H4125"\w*:\f + \fr 13.23 \ft had…: Heb. had made to dwell with them\f*

And their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* in the speech of \w Ashdod|strong="H0797"\w*, and \w could|strong="H5234"\w* not \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in the \w Jews’ language|strong="H3066"\w*, but according to the \w language|strong="H3956"\w* of \w each|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 13.24 \ft could…: Heb. they discerned not to speak\f*\f + \fr 13.24 \ft of each…: Heb. of people and people\f*

And I \w contended|strong="H7378"\w* with them, and \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* them, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of them, and plucked off their \w hair|strong="H4803"\w*, and made them \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* by \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add saying\add*, Ye shall not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* your \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, nor \w take|strong="H5375"\w* their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto your \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, or for yourselves.\f + \fr 13.25 \ft cursed: or, reviled\f*

Did not \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* by these things? yet among \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* was there no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* like him, who was \w beloved|strong="H0157"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* him \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: nevertheless even \w him|strong="H1571"\w* did \w outlandish|strong="H5237"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* cause to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

Shall we then \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all this \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, to \w transgress|strong="H4603"\w* against our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w marrying|strong="H3427"\w* \w strange|strong="H5237"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*?

And \add one\add* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \add was\add* son in \w law|strong="H2860"\w* to \w Sanballat|strong="H5571"\w* the \w Horonite|strong="H2772"\w*: therefore I \w chased|strong="H1272"\w* him from me.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* them, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, because they have \w defiled|strong="H1352"\w* the \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w*, and the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w*, and of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.\f + \fr 13.29 \ft because…: Heb. for the defilings\f*

Thus \w cleansed|strong="H2891"\w* I them from all \w strangers|strong="H5236"\w*, and \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* the \w wards|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w business|strong="H4399"\w*;

And for the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, at \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2163"\w*, and for the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w*. \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.
